recommend_list.title: Sanya historic scene area
recommend_list.description: all the year round with li and miao New Year big temple fair, hc section, water-sprinkling festival, chinese-style chest covering, masks and other activities, are very popular with tourists, is an ideal destination to sanya vigil.

recommend_list.title: Chimelong International Circus
recommend_list.description: Guangzhou Chimelong International Circus will be ushering in the festival with a special themed event

recommend_list.title: Yalong Bay Tropical Paradise Forest Park
recommend_list.description: Surround the National Hoilday Resort of Yalong, leveled on world-class eco-resort coast mountain forest with various species, unique geographic structure, abundant water resources and colorful folk culture.

weekend_list.title: Beijing\'s Top Hot Springs
weekend_list.description: Spending a few hours at a hot spring is a great way to relax and rejuvenate.

weekend_list.title: Top 10 Must See Places in Beijing
weekend_list.description: You should make sure to get around the top ten places in Beijing City. In this way, you can say that you have been to Beijing City!

weekend_list.title: The Imperial City
weekend_list.description: It is a section of the city of Beijing in the Ming and Qing dynasties, with the Forbidden City at its center.

weekend_list.title: Best Cultural Museums in Beijing
weekend_list.description: Millions of words have been written ruminating on the idea of \'culture\' – what it is, what it means, why it matters – but, broadly defined, it\'s the stuff that makes up the rich fabric of human civilisation.

weekend_list.title: Beijing Aquarium
weekend_list.description: Beijing Aquarium is the largest and most advanced inland aquarium in China, covering a total area of 30 acres.
